sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import "../styles/STARWARS/starwarsfont.css" import imageUrls from '../imageUrls'; function StarshipPage (props) { console.log(props) const backgroundImages = [ "https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GqCQoxHfW1Y/T5FdSTKtF8I/AAAAAAAAUK0/RAx4PQzGN94/s1600/space+wallpaper+(20).jpg", "https://wallpaperaccess.com/full/2137907.jpg" ] const randomIndex= Math.floor(Math.random() * backgroundImages.length) const {name, manufacturer, cost_in_credits, length, crew, passengers, starship_class} = props.history.location.state.starship const styleForWrapper = {...starshipStyles.appContentWrapper, backgroundImage: `url(${backgroundImages[randomIndex]})`} const divMultiplier = name.length * 30 let starshipStyles = { appContentWrapper: { margin: "0 auto", width: "100vw", minHeight: "100vh", overflowX: "hidden", overflowY: "hidden", backgroundSize: "cover", backgroundPosition: "center", backgroundRepeat: "no-repeat" }, picture: { margin: "0 auto", minHeight: "400px", minWidth: "400px", maxHeight: "600px", maxWidth: "600px", marginTop: "5vh", boxShadow: "0px 0px 15px white", backgroundImage: `${imageUrls[props.history.location.state.imageNum]}`, backgroundSize: "cover", backgroundSize: "cover", backgroundPosition: "center", backgroundRepeat: "no-repeat", border: "1px white solid" }, detailWrapper: { margin: "0 auto", width: "70vw", backgroundColor: "rgba(0,0,0,.8)", padding: "13px", borderRadius: "5px" }, shipName: { margin: "0 auto", maxWidth: `${divMultiplier}px`, textAlign: "center", display: "block", marginTop: "50px", marginBottom: "30px", color: "yellow", fontSize: "40px", fontFamily: "STARWARS", backgroundColor: "rgba(0,0,0,.8)", borderRadius: "4px", "padding": "10px" }, shipDetail: { color: "white", fontSize: "20px", alignText: "left", paddingLeft: "7px" } } return (
{name}

Starship Class: {starship_class}

Production Cost: {cost_in_credits}

Crew Size: {crew}

Passenger Capacity: {passengers}

Manufacturer: {manufacturer}

) } export default StarshipPage;
